channel.title: Fighter subclass "Banneret" is not official, not tagged, and should be removed?
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Fighter subclass "Banneret" is not official, not tagged, and should be removed?" - Fighter subclass "Banneret" is not official and not tagged and should be removed?

item.title: Re: Fighter subclass "Banneret" is not official, not tagged, and should be removed?
item.content:encoded:
Hey, the Banneret subclass is the Purple Dragon Knight from Sword Coast Adventure Guide, an official WotC product. It goes by the name Purple Dragon Knight, but Banneret is the setting agnostic name.

Thanks for the feedback regardless.

item.title: Fighter subclass "Banneret" is not official, not tagged, and should be removed?
item.content:encoded:
The fighter subclass listed as "Banneret" is not official Wizards of the Coast content, but is hombrew.
Listed on the Fighter page, under subclasses
See the full page under:
Fighter:Banneret
Now, I haven't edited on this wiki before, but I've been using it for a while, I thought homebrew wasn't allowed.
Or at least was supposed to be tagged as homebrew?
Shouldn't this be removed?
